ComicInfo.Title: Blood In The Waters
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghost Rider meets a man named Frank Phillips whose hairpin temper is only slightly less terrifying than his vitriolic hate for dolphins!
Notes: Features the Hostess Twinkies ad, Spider-Man And The Kidnap Caper
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:29:39. [CVDB16079]
ComicInfo.Penciller: George Tuska, Dave Cockrum, Dave Cockrum, George Tuska
ComicInfo.Inker: Vince Colletta, Dave Cockrum, Mike Esposito, Dave Cockrum
ComicInfo.Letterer: Karen Mantlo, Gaspar Saladino, Annette Kawecki
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Annette Kawecki, Dave Cockrum, Mike Esposito
